title: Google\Cloud\Spanner\Admin\Database\V1\EncryptionInfo
name: EncryptionInfo
description:
Encryption information for a Cloud Spanner database or backup.

Generated from protobuf message google.spanner.admin.database.v1.EncryptionInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.encryption_status
params.description: Output only. If present, the status of a recent encrypt/decrypt call on underlying data for this database or backup. Regardless of status, data is always encrypted at rest.

params.name: data.kms_key_version
params.description: Output only. A Cloud KMS key version that is being used to protect the database or backup.

methods.description:
